channel.title: Demolitionx [UPDATED] [REMAKE]
channel.description:
[ul][list][u][b]Welcome To Demolitionx Development![/b][/u]
[color=red]The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [b][color=orange]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. [color=green]The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished. [b]Features:[/b] [list] [li]Full Castle Wars[/li] [li]Full Fight Pits[/li] [li]Full Duel Arena[/li] [li]Full Thieving[/li] [li]Fully Working Melee[/li] [li]Fully Working Magic[/li] [li]Fully Working Range[/li] [li]12 Completed Quests[/li] [li]90% Prayer Working[/li] [li]Fully Working Pest Control[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [/list] [b]Latest updates:[/b] [list] [li]::home added[/li] [li]::castlewars added[/li] [li]::fightpits added[/li] [li]::jad[/li] [li]::duel[/li] [/list]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20060904214339/runescape/images/archive/5/5c/20100607202120!Minigame_icon.png[/img] [b]Minigames[/b]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Minigames/Fight_Pits_lobby.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Minigames/Castle_Wars.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Combat/Cannon.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Combat/Near_Perfected_Combat.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Magic/Auto_Casting.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[img]http://i771.photobucket.com/albums/xx354/Magic_Bolero/thieving_icon.gif[/img] [b]Thieving[/b]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Thieving/Theiving_Attack.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Thieving/Stall_Thieving.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Thieving/Dissapearing_Stalls.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Thieving/Pickpocketing.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Smithing/Smithing.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Smithing/Smithing_001.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]

[ul][list]Welcome To Demolitionx Development!
